page.title: 15A Nine Year Old's Day
page.content:
On Wednesday{Sarah Rhodes}gets up at about half past seven. Then she gets dressed and has breakfast at quarter to eight. She likes hot milk. She also has cereal and toast.
After breakfast she gets washed and brushes her hair and cleans her teeth, and, if there is time, she goes in the garden. Then she gets her bag at quarter to nine and goes to school in the car.
At{school}she likes art work, games, English and maths. At playtimes she likes to play horses, skipping and running around.
When she gets home she gets changed into her riding suit and she goes out for a long ride in the forest.
